All that piece and parcel of land with all other improvements /building /appurtenances therein having a Total extent of 2.02 Ares in Re-Sy.No.183/4-5 (Sy.No.2081/3) In Re-Sy Block No.17 Kottamkara Village situated at Kollam Taluk, Kundara Sub District, Kollam District and rights thereto more fully described under Sale Deed No.248/2021 Registered in Kundara Sub Registrar Office.
